grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 邦楽【ホウガク】Japanese music (esp. traditional Japanese music)
邦画【ホウガ】Japanese film, Japanese painting
東邦【トウホウ】Oriental country, the Orient
kun reading compounds: 国【くに】country, state, region, national government, central government, home (i.e. hometown, home country), province (of Japan), land, earth
